sections.heading: Venue; change; when allowed.All criminal cases shall be tried in the county where the offense was committed, except as otherwise provided in section 25-412
sections.text: 03 or sections 29-1301.01 to 29-1301.04, or unless it shall appear to the court by affidavits that a fair and impartial trial cannot be had ther

sections.heading: in reviewing order restricting publication of certain information before trial of murder case. State v. Simants, 194 Neb. 783, 236 N.W.2d 794 (1975).
